accomodations.title: Horsethief Campground
accomodations.description: Great spot with group campsite, but they need to be reserved months in advance

accomodations.title: Koloa Landing
accomodations.description: Beautiful resort with pools, restaurants, etc. Right by the beach. Exceptional. And priced accordingly

accomodations.title: Unstad Beach Camping
accomodations.description: Amazing, uncrowded beach to camp on for free. Sunset over the Artic Ocean also free.

accomodations.title: Jardin Del Mar Airbnb
accomodations.description: Beautiful house with incredible fenced in yard and garden. 10/10 would come again

accomodations.title: BLM Land Near Sand Dunes
accomodations.description: Great spot, plenty of room to spread out. Road gets gnarlier the further you go.

accomodations.title: Hotel Telluride
accomodations.description: Nice place, good service, outdoor hottub is perfect

activities.title: Long Canyon Road
activities.description: Gnarly road, wouldn't do it in a basic 4WD vehicle

activities.title: Corona Arch Hike
activities.description: Beautiful 3 mile round-trip hike to arch. steep section with rope and a ladder, not great for dogs but towards the end. Dogs are allowed.

activities.title: Napali Coast Boat Tour
activities.description: Awesome boat tour of the Napali Coast. Sunset cruise with dinner was wonderful

activities.title: Myvatn Nature Baths
activities.description: Rad spot if nearby. Similar to Blue Lagoon, but cheaper and less crowded

activities.title: Unstad Arctic Surf
activities.description: Surfboard & wetsuit rentals, lessons, food, and hostel. Very cool spot.

activities.title: Sayulita Beach
activities.description: Great surf spot, can be busy be plenty of room to spread out. Waves best in AM

activities.title: Nosara Tattoo
activities.description: Cool spot, good guys, did good work

activities.title: Poipu Beach
activities.description: Watch the sunset here. Will change your life.

activities.title: Mountain Bike Telluride Mt.
activities.description: Super fun downhill trails and bike park. Take the gondola up.

activities.title: Bridal Veil Falls
activities.description: Fairly short, fairly steep hike to cool waterfall overlooking town.

activities.title: Kayak Swan River
activities.description: Rent a kayak, paddle up a river or to the ocean. Is cool.

activities.title: 4 Wheel on Sandy Neck
activities.description: Cool spot, can drive truck on beach at low tide

dining.title: 98 Center
dining.description: Awesome Vietnamese dine-in and take-out with great vegan options

dining.title: Moab Coffee Roasters
dining.description: Decent coffee shop with baked goods and gelato

dining.title: Bubba Burgers
dining.description: Basic burger / fries place with decent food, reasonable prices

dining.title: The Dolphin
dining.description: Trendy sushi / fish place with great food

dining.title: El Itacate
dining.description: Amazing tacos, Isaac is the man. We ate there almost every night.

dining.title: Anchor Cafe
dining.description: Trendy coffee shop with healthy breakfast and lunch options - smoothie bowls, avocado toast, etc

dining.title: La Cocina
dining.description: Great mexican food, breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

dining.title: Between the Covers
dining.description: Cool bookstore with a coffeeshop in back. Best coffee in town.

dining.title: Siam
dining.description: Great thai food, a bit pricey, hard to get a table / reservation

dining.title: Sheridan Hotel
dining.description: Best Old Fashioned in town, very cool atmosphere

dining.title: Gina's by the Sea
dining.description: Awesome Italian food by the beach. Gets very crowded.

dining.title: Sesuit Harbor Cafe
dining.description: Cool spot with take out, can eat overlooking harbor at picnic tables

dining.title: Marshside
dining.description: Has coffee and pastries in the AM, can sit by marsh and enjoy

dining.title: The Ocean House
dining.description: Rad bar overlooking the ocean, also has good food
